content.en: Enhancing fingerprint recognition: Artificial neural networks have been found to improve the recognition rate of fingerprint recognition systems, especially in low-quality conditions. Convolutional neural networks can achieve state-of-the-art results in fingerprint liveness detection, while deep neural networks show high performance and robustness in classifying low-quality fingerprints. Additionally, convolutional neural networks have been shown to improve the accuracy and robustness of fingerprint classification, and can also be used for fingerprint matching in biometric authentication. These findings highlight the positive impact of algorithms in enhancing the efficiency and accuracy of fingerprint analysis and recognition.
content.da: Forbedring af fingeraftryksgenkendelse: Kunstige neurale netværk har vist sig at forbedre genkendelsesraten af fingeraftryksgenkendelsessystemer, især under lavkvalitetsbetingelser. Konvolutionelle neurale netværk kan opnå førende resultater i detektion af fingeraftrykslivstegn, mens dybe neurale netværk viser høj ydeevne og robusthed i klassificering af fingeraftryk af lav kvalitet. Derudover har konvolutionelle neurale netværk vist sig at forbedre nøjagtigheden og robustheden af fingeraftryksklassificering og kan også bruges til fingeraftryksmatching i biometrisk autentificering. Disse fund fremhæver algoritmernes positive indvirkning på at forbedre effektiviteten og nøjagtigheden af fingeraftryksanalyse og genkendelse.
